subject: Baseball
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Shortstop Ruben Tejada was out of the lineup Thursday after being hit by a pitch the night before, but he did not sustain a concussion and he traveled with the Mets from Seattle to Milwaukee.
snippet: Shortstop Ruben Tejada was out of the lineup Thursday after being hit by a pitch the night before, but he did not sustain a concussion and he traveled with the Mets from Seattle to Milwaukee.
